column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My wife and I have continued to visit Bavette's for our wedding anniversary every NYE. In December 2020
column2: we ordered takeout due to the pandemic
column3: and in 2021 we dined in. Each time our steaks were perfectly cooked
column4: the creamed spinach was excellent as usual
column5: and the pommes frites were amazing. The service is also exceptional and we feel very welcome each time we visit.
